title: Best Cryptos to Join This Month: How Qubetics, Solana, and Astra Are Dominating the Market
body: Why do some crypto projects soar while others fail? With thousands of tokens available, identifying the real opportunities can be challenging. Crypto isn‚Äôt just a trend‚Äîit‚Äôs transforming finance, offering unique investment potential. Choosing the right projects is key to maximizing gains and avoiding missed opportunities. Qubetics has recently emerged as a prominent name in the blockchain space. Far beyond a conventional cryptocurrency token, it serves as a comprehensive ecosystem designed to revolutionize asset ownership, trading, and monetization. By seamlessly integrating multiple blockchains and advanced financial tools, Qubetics enhances accessibility, security, and efficiency in decentralized transactions. But Qubetics isn‚Äôt the only big player in town. Heavyweights like Solana and Astra have already carved out their spots in the crypto hall of fame. Solana is revolutionizing blockchain speed, making it a go-to for DeFi and gaming, while Astra is ensuring regulatory compliance for decentralized finance. So, if you‚Äôre wondering which of these cryptos is the best to join this month, let‚Äôs dive into what makes them stand out. Qubetics: Redefining Real-World Asset Ownership Qubetics isn‚Äôt just another altcoin. It‚Äôs a game-changer in asset ownership, using blockchain technology to tokenize real-world assets. Imagine a world where owning a share of a skyscraper, a rare piece of art, or even a luxury car is as easy as buying Bitcoin. That‚Äôs what Qubetics is making possible. At its core, Qubetics is building a Real World Asset Tokenization Marketplace, allowing businesses, professionals, and individuals to convert physical assets into blockchain-based tokens. This isn‚Äôt some futuristic dream‚Äîit‚Äôs happening right now. A real estate developer wants to raise capital for a new apartment complex. Instead of dealing with banks or big investors, they tokenize the property on Qubetics, allowing everyday investors to buy fractional ownership in the building. Suddenly, real estate investment isn‚Äôt just for the ultra-rich. The same goes for collectibles, fine art, and even businesses looking to sell equity in a decentralized way. Qubetics is proving that investors are hungry for blockchain-backed asset ownership, and the numbers tell the whole story. With over $12.3 million raised in its presale, more than 466 million $TICS tokens sold, and a growing community of 19,200+ token holders, Qubetics is gaining serious traction. Currently priced at $0.0667 in Stage 20 of the presale, the momentum is undeniable. These milestones aren‚Äôt just impressive‚Äîthey signal massive adoption on the horizon. As demand for real-world asset tokenization grows, Qubetics is positioning itself as a leader in this evolving market. Solana: The High-Speed Blockchain Powerhouse If you‚Äôve been in crypto for a while, you‚Äôve probably heard the phrase ‚ÄúEthereum killer.‚Äù While many projects have made that claim, Solana is one of the few that actually has the tech to back it up. Known for blazing-fast transactions and dirt-cheap fees, Solana has become a go-to blockchain for DeFi platforms, NFT marketplaces, and even Web3 gaming projects. While Ethereum struggles with high gas fees and network congestion, Solana is cruising along with its Proof of History (PoH) mechanism, processing thousands of transactions per second. Solana isn‚Äôt just hype‚Äîit‚Äôs delivering real results. In 2024, Solana-based decentralized exchanges (DEXs) outpaced Ethereum‚Äôs DEX volume, hitting a 24-hour trading volume of $3.8 billion compared to Ethereum‚Äôs $1.7 billion. That‚Äôs a big deal. Right now, Solana‚Äôs native token SOL is trading around $198.81, but many analysts believe it could soar to $700 or beyond by the end of 2025. Why? Because Solana isn‚Äôt just competing with Ethereum‚Äîit‚Äôs eating into its market share. For investors looking for the best cryptos to join this month, Solana remains a strong contender due to its scalability, growing ecosystem, and increasing institutional interest. Astra: Bringing Compliance to DeFi While DeFi is all about decentralization, there‚Äôs one thing most projects struggle with‚Äîcompliance. Governments worldwide are tightening their grip on crypto regulations, and many DeFi platforms could be in trouble if they don‚Äôt find a way to play by the rules. That‚Äôs where Astra comes in. Astra is the first decentralized compliance protocol, ensuring that DeFi platforms meet regulatory requirements while still keeping things decentralized. Think of it as a security guard for the wild world of DeFi, making sure everything is above board while still allowing users to benefit from decentralized finance. Regulatory uncertainty is one of the biggest threats to crypto‚Äôs mainstream adoption. Without proper compliance measures, DeFi could face massive crackdowns. Astra provides a decentralized KYC (Know Your Customer) solution, ensuring that DeFi platforms can onboard users without violating laws. Currently, Astra‚Äôs native token ASTRA is trading at about $0.0016, with steady growth in adoption. While it‚Äôs not as flashy as Solana or Qubetics, Astra is solving a major problem that could shape the future of crypto regulation. Conclusion If you‚Äôre looking for the best cryptos to join this month, Qubetics , Solana, and Astra each bring something unique. Qubetics‚Äô real-world asset tokenization marketplace unlocks new investment opportunities beyond traditional crypto. Solana dominates the high-speed blockchain space, offering low fees and lightning-fast transactions as a strong Ethereum competitor. Meanwhile, Astra tackles one of crypto‚Äôs biggest hurdles‚ÄîDeFi compliance, ensuring security and regulatory adherence as oversight tightens. While all three projects have strong fundamentals, Qubetics is the clear frontrunner. With its booming presale, real-world asset integration, and bullish price predictions, $TICS is shaping up to be a top crypto investment in 2025. title: Strategy‚Äôs Michael Saylor hints at resumption of Bitcoin purchases on Monday
body: Michael Saylor is ready to pull the trigger again. The co-founder of Strategy, formerly known as MicroStrategy, shared his usual Sunday Bitcoin chart on X today, teasing yet another purchase set for Monday. ‚ÄúDeath to the blue lines. Long live the green dots,‚Äù Saylor said to his 4.1 million followers in the post, hinting at an end to the brief one-week pause in Bitcoin buying. Death to the blue lines. Long live the green dots. pic.twitter.com/SOtFHRoykd ‚Äî Michael Saylor‚ö°Ô∏è (@saylor) February 9, 2025 Strategy, according to tracking platform SaylorTracker, currently holds 471,107 BTC. That stash is valued at $45.3 billion and includes the company‚Äôs January 27 addition of 10,107 BTC before the pause. Rebrand puts Bitcoin front and center On February 5, MicroStrategy shed its old identity and officially became Strategy and leaned into its Bitcoin-first reputation by adopting a Bitcoin logo. The company swapped its branding colors for Bitcoin-themed ones and made sure its marketing screamed pro-Bitcoin at every turn. Phong Le, Strategy‚Äôs CEO, said: ‚ÄúBitcoin and artificial intelligence are the two most transformative technologies of the twenty-first century. Our new name powerfully, and simply, conveys the universal and global appeal of our company.‚Äù Strategy released its Q4 2024 earnings report on the same day it announced the rebrand and its software business pulled in $120.7 million in revenue‚Äîa 3% year-over-year drop. More notably, they posted a $640 million net loss for the quarter. Regardless, Q4 2024 became the company‚Äôs most aggressive quarter yet, with 218,887 Bitcoins worth $20.5 billion added to their pile. During the earnings call, Strategy presented shareholders with its roadmap for Bitcoin gains in 2025. They pointed to major catalysts, including the possibility of regulatory clarity in the US, stronger political support for digital assets, and improvements to Bitcoin ETFs as well as institutional investors. On August 7, 2024, Strategy split both Class A and Class B shares 10-for-1, which slashed entry costs for new investors and opened the doors for a wider base of potential shareholders. By the end of December, they had issued 42.3 million shares of Class A stock, raising $15.1 billion. In January and February 2025, they issued another 6.5 million shares, securing $2.4 billion. Even with these massive raises, Strategy still has $4.3 billion in Class A shares available for future offerings. CFO Andrew Kang called the company‚Äôs capital plan ‚Äúfiring on all cylinders‚Äù and confirmed they‚Äôve already raised $20 billion out of their $42 billion goal. And that‚Äôs not all. Early in 2025, Strategy launched its first convertible preferred stock offering, raking in $584 million from institutional and retail backers. The company also issued $3 billion in 0% Convertible Senior Notes in November 2024, which will mature in 2029. These notes allow investors to convert holdings into Strategy stock at $672.40 per share, a price investors are betting will be a steal down the line. From the $3 billion note issuance, the company netted $2.97 billion after fees. But they weren‚Äôt done. In January 2025, they rolled out another fundraising vehicle: Series A Perpetual Strike Preferred Stock. Priced at $80 per share, this raised $563.4 million after expenses. These preferred shares come with an 8% annual dividend and a $100 liquidation preference, giving Strategy another steady funding option. Strategy‚Äôs Bitcoin returns in 2024 were through the roof, with a BTC Yield of 74.3%. But for 2025, they‚Äôve set a more conservative 15% target in a reported move toward a more sustainable pace. title: Canary Capital Snubs Dogecoin ETF, Here‚Äôs Why
body: The cryptocurrency market might have a new spot product in the Dogecoin (DOGE) exchange-traded fund (ETF). This is because several asset managers in the U.S. appear set to launch it, as there are predictions that both DOGE ETF and Solana ETF could trigger the growth of RCO Finance. However, Canary Capital says it is not interested in joining the bandwagon. Dogecoin‚Äôs Lack of Utility and Unlimited Supply Raise Concerns According to a report , Steven McClurg, Canary Capital CEO, says the investment firm is interested in launching a spot DOGE ETF. The lack of interest in an ETF product for the dog-themed memecoin follows consideration of certain factors. Notably, McClurg emphasized the lack of utility for Dogecoin in the broader cryptocurrency space. Besides utility, he also highlighted the memecoin‚Äôs unlimited supply. These two factors are enough to discourage Canary Capital from considering launching an ETF. McClurg argued that DOGE, by design, will continue to depreciate as its supply increases. As such, he does not consider it fit for an ETF product as the supply remains unlimited. Canary Capital Eyes XRP, Solana, and Other Crypto ETFs Interestingly, Canary Capital is among several investment firms competing for other products. Notable among their interests include XRP and Solana. Since President Donald Trump returned to the White House, crypto industry stakeholders have looked forward to favorable regulation. Given its crypto-friendly disposition, many have rushed to file crypto ETF products . As such, Canary Capital has filed to launch ETF products for Solana, Litecoin, HBAR, and XRP. Unlike DOGE, Solana (SOL) has utility as it serves to pay for transactions on the Solana network. Recently, SOL was used for trading the popular official Trump memecoin. This not only boosted the value of the price of SOL but also increased activity on Solana. Asset Managers Bet on Dogecoin‚Äôs Loyal Community However, experts say what Dogecoin lacks in utility, it makes up for in its loyal fan base. A notable fan of the memecoin is Elon Musk, Tesla‚Äôs founder. The entrepreneur has consistently supported the memecoin with occasional posts on X. Musk‚Äôs posts usually trigger bullish sentiments in the ecosystem. Dogecoin‚Äôs loyal fan base and recent developments in the U.S. space might have prompted some asset managers to apply for an ETF to track DOGE. Notably, Grayscale has launched a Dogecoin Trust after it filed with regulatory authority to convert the fund into a spot ETF. The post Canary Capital Snubs Dogecoin ETF, Here‚Äôs Why appeared first on TheCoinrise.com .

title: Solana Faces Key Test ‚Äì What Happens Next Could Be Game-Changing
body: Crypto analyst Ali Martinez has highlighted a crucial moment for the price action of Solana, pointing to a key support level within a parallel channel. His technical analysis, which is based on SOL price action on the daily candlestick timeframe, shows that the altcoin has been trading in an uptrend channel since July 2024. Notably, this uptrend channel has been highlighted by the formation of higher lows and higher highs as Solana continued to push to new all-time highs. Now, Martinez noted that holding above a key support level could reinforce the altcoin‚Äôs uptrend towards the upper trendline of the support channel. Related Reading: Bold Prediction: XRP Holders On The Path To Millionaire Status‚ÄîAnalyst Analyst‚Äôs Technical Outlook: A Make-Or-Break Support Level At the time of Martinez‚Äôs analysis, Solana was trading at $193, following a barrage of declines throughout last week. Notably, this decline saw Solana hit the bottom trendline of this uptrend channel. As such, the analyst noted that SOL‚Äôs action from here could determine its next big move. If Solana manages to hold above this support level, the uptrend could regain strength, and the channel will still be in play. In this case, Solana will still be on track to push toward the upper end of the channel, which puts the price target around $387. On the other hand, if the support fails, a deeper correction could be on the table. Image From X: Ali_charts Solana Price Action: A Rollercoaster Ride To $293 And Back SOL is one of the best-performing cryptocurrencies in the current crypto cycle, with its price recently skyrocketing to a new all-time high of $293 on January 19. The rally was primarily driven by a wave of interest following the launch of the Official Trump meme coin on the Solana blockchain, adding momentum to an already bullish trend for the altcoin. However, the euphoria has since cooled off, with Solana experiencing a 30% decline since the all-time high. Since the time of the analysis, Solana has managed to rebound slightly from the lower boundary of its uptrend channel. Solana is currently trading at $204, meaning it has increased by about 5.7% since Martinez highlighted the key support zone. This reversal suggests that the uptrend channel is still in play, and Solana could continue to push upwards until it reaches $389. Interestingly, this price target at the upper end of the channel is reinforced by the Fibonacci extension indicator. Related Reading: Final Dip? Dogecoin Correction Could Precede A Record Surge‚ÄîAnalyst This indicator is extended from the Solana low of $109 in August 2024, and the $389 price target is at the 1.272 extension level. The significance of this extension is reinforced by the fact that Solana‚Äôs January peak also coincided with the 1.0 Fibonacci level. Despite this recovery, the bullish momentum has yet to fully confirm itself with a strong breakout. There is still a possibility that Solana could retest the lower boundary of the channel again before establishing a more decisive uptrend. Featured image from Fortune, chart from TradingView

title: BlockDAG Miner Sales Cross 15,850 Units While Hyperliquid Extends Losses ‚Äî Can Toncoin Hold Its Ground?

The Relative Strength Index (RSI) suggests an oversold condition, which may encourage additional buying. However, the MACD continues to reflect a bearish outlook, signaling caution. The low initial investment, combined with its energy efficiency and strong return potential, has positioned BDAG as a leading choice for crypto miners. Beyond mining, BlockDAG‚Äôs rapid market expansion is evident. This makes mining rewards significantly more valuable, encouraging early adopters to secure rigs before the anticipated price surge. As BDAG gains traction, its impact in the crypto sector is becoming increasingly clear, prompting miners to take action now. Toncoin has shown some recovery signs, but whether it can sustain momentum remains uncertain. BlockDAG, however, is making a significant mark. Analysts anticipate a price increase past $20 by 2027, reinforcing BDAG‚Äôs long-term potential. Those securing mining hardware now may be positioning themselves for substantial future gains. title: Study: Social Media Users Are More Likely to Invest in Crypto
body: A new study from the University of Georgia (UGA) has found that social media users are more likely to invest in crypto. The research concluded that engagement on platforms like YouTube, Reddit, and X increases the likelihood of investing in digital currencies. Social Media‚Äôs Influence on Crypto Investments The UGA review found that approximately half of social media users surveyed had invested in crypto, compared to just 10% of those who do not use social networks. Furthermore, it concluded that the more platforms an individual engaged with, the more likely they were to invest in the asset class. Those on YouTube, Reddit, X, and Clubhouse showed the highest investment rates, while Instagram users demonstrated less enthusiasm for crypto. The researchers suggested that this is because the first three facilitate discussions about crypto through long-form videos and text-based threads as opposed to Instagram‚Äôs visually oriented content. ‚ÄúA lot of people talk about cryptocurrency on social media and how popular it has become,‚Äù said Lu Fan, an associate professor at UGA. ‚ÄúThere are a lot of celebrities talking about this. People are thinking, ‚ÄòBecause my friends, family, and the celebrities I admire all invest in that, maybe I should too,‚Äù she added. The survey also revealed that investment patterns were influenced by demographics. Men and individuals with a higher risk tolerance were more likely to invest in crypto, while those with higher education levels were less inclined. Age also played a role, with older people showing less interest. Growth of Crypto Investments and Risk Awareness UGA‚Äôs findings are similar to a past report from the National Financial Capability Study and Investor Survey, which showed that in 2018, 15% of participants had invested in crypto. By 2021, that number had risen to 28%. The 2021 version of the survey also found that awareness had increased, with more than one in three participants considering an investment, compared to less than 20% in 2018. The University‚Äôs analysis also highlighted concerns about misinformation on social media. The researchers found that younger investors, who make up the largest part of the demographic, may overestimate their investment knowledge and be vulnerable to scams and poor financial advice. Professor Fan emphasized the importance of evaluating whether crypto aligns with an individual‚Äôs financial goals rather than making investment decisions based on social media trends. The research concluded by suggesting that policymakers consider these findings when developing regulations for crypto markets. Additionally, it called for increased efforts in media literacy education to help people distinguish between credible investment advice and misleading information. The post Study: Social Media Users Are More Likely to Invest in Crypto appeared first on CryptoPotato .

title: What you Need to Sign Up and Start Betting at an Online Casino
body: Joining an online casino can feel like stepping into a realm of endless possibilities, where games of chance and skill come together to offer entertainment and potential winnings. Many newcomers to online betting often wonder what is actually required to begin their journey. While each platform may have its own set of rules and unique features, most modern online casinos strive for a streamlined experience that allows you to register, deposit funds, and start playing without unnecessary complications. Understanding the key steps involved will help you navigate sign-up processes and deposit methods with confidence, so you can focus on enjoying your time at the virtual tables. Understanding the Basics of Registration The first stage in registering at an online casino typically involves providing basic personal information in a digital form like on this betway sign up page. This process usually requires your full name, date of birth, and contact details. The online casino needs these details not only to create your account but also to ensure compliance with gambling regulations. Establishing your age is crucial, as most legitimate casinos will only allow individuals who are of legal gambling age in their jurisdiction to proceed. Many platforms use secure software to verify your identity quickly, which helps maintain a safe and responsible environment for everyone involved. Once you submit your initial details, you will typically be asked to create a username and password. This step is important for securing your account and personal data. Many betting sites now provide two-factor authentication options , giving you an added layer of security when you log in. Taking a few moments to choose a strong, memorable password is a wise decision that can protect your account from unwanted access. After verifying your account via email or SMS, you‚Äôll officially be a member of the online casino, ready to move on to the next phase. Providing Identification and Verification Although the basic sign-up forms help casinos gather essential information, there may come a stage where you are asked to provide scanned documents or photos of your ID. This additional step, often referred to as KYC (Know Your Customer), is a legal requirement in many regions and serves to confirm that the details you provided during registration are accurate. Verification measures can include a copy of your passport or driver‚Äôs license, proof of address in the form of a utility bill, or a recent bank statement. This process might sound daunting at first, but reputable casinos implement these measures to prevent underage gambling and financial fraud. In many cases, once your verification documents are approved, you will find that deposits and withdrawals process more smoothly. The exact requirements for document submission vary from one site to another, and different countries have differing rules. While some platforms allow you to start playing immediately after registration, others might request verification before you begin wagering. It is worth keeping digital copies of your relevant documents ready so that if a casino asks for confirmation, you can provide it quickly. These safeguards ultimately protect both you and the casino, ensuring a secure and trustworthy betting experience. Depositing Funds and Exploring Payment Methods When it comes to placing bets, you will naturally need a way to fund your account. Modern casinos offer a variety of deposit options, making it easier for players in different parts of the world to add money to their balance. Some players prefer credit or debit cards, while others opt for e-wallet services that provide a level of separation between personal banking information and casino accounts. In certain regions, prepaid cards or direct bank transfers might also be available. Some players even fund their accounts using cryptocurrencies or bitcoin lending apps . It is generally a good idea to start with small deposits to get a feel for the platform and confirm that everything runs smoothly. Some casinos reward new players with welcome bonuses or free spins upon their first deposit, giving you extra incentives to explore their selection of games. Reading through the terms and conditions is wise, because it ensures you know exactly how wagering requirements work and what is needed to withdraw potential winnings. Clear knowledge of these rules can help you avoid misunderstandings later on, especially if you aim to cash out your earnings. Navigating Bonus Offers and Promotions Bonuses and promotions often play a big role in attracting new players, and signing up for an online casino might grant you a welcome package that includes free spins or a deposit match. These rewards can amplify your initial bankroll, giving you a chance to explore different games without risking too much of your own money. However, it is critical to understand any attached terms, such as wagering requirements or game restrictions. Some bonuses may be exclusive to certain slots or table games, and you may need to wager bonus funds a specific number of times before converting them into real cash. Taking a moment to review these details helps you make informed decisions and avoid feeling misled by promotional hype. It also allows you to maximize the benefits of any rewards you receive. Exploring the Game Selection Once you‚Äôve gone through the steps on the betway sign up page and funded your account, the real excitement begins as you explore a vast array of casino games. Modern platforms cater to every taste, from classic slot machines with fruit symbols to immersive video slots that feature captivating storylines, bonus rounds, and special effects. Fans of table games can dive into blackjack, roulette, or baccarat, either playing against software or joining live-dealer sessions that stream real-time footage from professional studios. This level of variety ensures you can always find a new game or variation to try, keeping the experience fresh and engaging. Observing how different wagers affect gameplay and learning the basics of each new challenge can be a rewarding process in itself. Disclaimer : This content is meant to inform and should not be considered financial advice. The views expressed in this article may include the author‚Äôs personal opinions and do not represent Times Tabloid‚Äôs opinion. Readers are urged to do in-depth research before making any investment decisions. Any action taken by the reader is strictly at their own risk. Times Tabloid is not responsible for any financial losses. The post What you Need to Sign Up and Start Betting at an Online Casino appeared first on Times Tabloid .

title: Major Ethereum Whale Invests $10 Million in Dogecoin and This Emerging Crypto Asset
body: A major Ethereum whale has allocated $10 million to Dogecoin (DOGE), highlighting continued demand for the meme coin. While DOGE remains a well-known asset, some investors are shifting focus to Mutuum Finance (MUTM), a decentralized lending platform currently in its presale phase. Offering real DeFi utilities such as lending, borrowing, and an overcollateralized stablecoin, Mutuum Finance is attracting early participants seeking high-growth potential. With its structured presale and planned exchange listings, analysts suggest that MUTM could deliver significant returns. Mutuum Finance (MUTM) Mutuum Finance (MUTM) is positioning itself as a strong contender in the DeFi space, offering decentralized lending and borrowing services through a secure protocol. Unlike speculative assets, MUTM provides real utility by allowing users to act as both suppliers and borrowers. This functionality, combined with its structured token model, has drawn attention from investors seeking long-term growth. At the core of Mutuum Finance‚Äôs platform are two lending markets: Peer-to-Contract (P2C) and Peer-to-Peer (P2P). The P2C market allows users to supply or borrow crypto from a liquidity pool under preset conditions, managed by automated smart contracts. This system minimizes risk and adjusts interest rates based on market demand. The P2P market provides more flexibility, letting users negotiate loan terms directly. It also supports assets not available in P2C, including meme coins like Shiba Inu (SHIB) and Pepe (PEPE). This gives borrowers and lenders access to a wider range of assets while maintaining the platform‚Äôs security. Mutuum Finance is also introducing an overcollateralized stablecoin to enhance liquidity. The stablecoin will be backed by collateral exceeding its issued value, ensuring stability and reliability. As adoption grows, demand for MUTM is expected to rise, further supporting price appreciation. Another key driver of price growth is Mutuum Finance‚Äôs buy-and-distribute mechanism. A portion of fees from lending and borrowing is used to purchase MUTM from the market, creating buy pressure. These tokens are then redistributed to holders, reducing the circulating supply and rewarding long-term investors. The presale is in its first stage, with MUTM priced at $0.01. In a short time, over 7 million tokens have been sold, raising more than $70,000 and attracting over 200 holders. As presale stages progress, the price will increase, reaching $0.06 in the final stage. Experts also anticipate that MUTM‚Äôs price will continue to rise after its launch, providing even greater returns for early investors. With real DeFi utilities, structured tokenomics, and growing market interest, analysts expect strong demand to push the token‚Äôs value higher once it is listed on exchanges. The project‚Äôs tokenomics are structured for long-term growth. Out of 4 billion total tokens, a large portion is allocated for the presale, liquidity, partnerships, and ecosystem expansion. This distribution ensures that the platform has the necessary resources to support its development, marketing, and future integrations while maintaining a balanced supply. A share of the total supply is also reserved for community incentives, including a $100,000 giveaway aimed at attracting new users. This giveaway will be split among 10 winners, each receiving $10,000 worth of MUTM tokens. To participate, users need to follow Mutuum Finance on social media, engage with its content, and complete the required steps outlined on the official website. Mutuum Finance also plans to launch a beta version of its platform alongside the token‚Äôs exchange listing. This will allow users to explore lending and borrowing features before the full release. With strong fundamentals, a clear roadmap, and growing investor interest, Mutuum Finance is emerging as a serious player in DeFi. Ethereum whales have also taken notice, investing in MUTM as they diversify into projects with real utility. With a structured approach and increasing demand, this token stands out as an asset worth considering before its presale stages sell out. For more information about Mutuum Finance (MUTM) visit the links below: Website: https://www.mutuum.finance/ Linktree: https://linktr.ee/mutuumfinance

title: Best Crypto Under a Penny: Qubetics & Astra Rise, While Aptos Leads in Ultra-Fast Transactions!
body: Ever wondered which low-cost crypto could turn a tiny investment into serious wealth? With thousands of coins out there, finding the real gems is no easy task. The trick is spotting projects that offer more than just hype‚Äîthey need real-world utility and strong market positioning. Among the most promising projects in 2025, Qubetics , Astra, and Aptos stand out. These aren‚Äôt just cheap tokens; they are game-changing crypto projects with massive growth potential. They‚Äôre shaking up the industry, making them top choices for investors looking to maximize their returns. Qubetics, the world‚Äôs first Web3 aggregator, is pioneering seamless blockchain integration with its Non-Custodial Multi-Chain Wallet and a strong partnership with 1inch. Astra is creating a decentralized AI-driven economy, making data ownership and AI services more accessible. Aptos, built by ex-Meta engineers, is bringing scalability and efficiency to blockchain networks. Let‚Äôs break down why these projects are the best cryptos under a penny in 2025 and why investors are eyeing them for serious gains. Qubetics: The Web3 Aggregator Leading the Crypto Evolution Crypto users want efficiency. Nobody enjoys dealing with multiple wallets, high fees, or slow transactions. Qubetics is fixing that. Qubetics is in its 21st presale stage, with the $TICS token priced at $0.0667. Analysts predict $TICS could hit $0.25 before the presale ends, a 274.70% ROI. Long-term forecasts suggest it could even skyrocket to $10, giving early investors a life-changing return. Qubetics isn‚Äôt just another token‚Äîit‚Äôs building critical infrastructure for the future of Web3. The Non-Custodial Multi-Chain Wallet lets users manage assets across multiple blockchains seamlessly, without relying on centralized exchanges. Imagine you‚Äôre a trader holding Ethereum, Solana, and Polygon tokens. Instead of switching between wallets and paying crazy gas fees, Qubetics‚Äô Multi-Chain Wallet lets you control everything from one simple interface. Then there‚Äôs the partnership with 1inch, one of the top decentralized exchange aggregators. This allows Qubetics users to swap tokens across blockchains at the best possible rates‚Äîall while staying in full control of their assets. For businesses, this is a game-changer. A global e-commerce platform can now accept crypto payments in multiple tokens without worrying about high conversion fees. For everyday investors, this means more savings, better trades, and ultimate control over their crypto. With all these innovations, Qubetics is proving itself to be one of the best cryptos under a penny in 2025. Trust Wallet Web3 The latest Trust Wallet Web3 Digest offers a deep dive into the newest Web3 dApp integrations, featuring Qubetics‚Äîan emerging blockchain project driving innovation in decentralized finance. This edition highlights cutting-edge Layer 1 ecosystems and AI-powered technologies reshaping transactions and dApps. By showcasing groundbreaking Web3 initiatives, Trust Wallet strengthens awareness, accelerates adoption, and fuels the evolution of blockchain solutions. Astra: The AI-Powered Decentralized Economy Artificial intelligence is changing the world, and Astra is making sure crypto is part of that revolution. Astra is building a decentralized AI-powered network where users can own, trade, and monetize AI-generated data and services. This could change everything from data privacy to how AI models are trained. Imagine a future where small businesses can access AI-powered analytics without paying insane fees to tech giants. Or where content creators can sell their AI-generated works without middlemen taking a huge cut. Astra‚Äôs approach to AI and blockchain integration has caught the attention of investors. By creating a trustless, permissionless AI economy, Astra is setting the stage for mass adoption. As more businesses and developers turn to decentralized AI, Astra‚Äôs token demand will likely explode‚Äîmaking it one of the best cryptos under a penny to invest in. Aptos: The Blockchain Built for Speed and Efficiency Aptos isn‚Äôt just another layer-1 blockchain‚Äîit‚Äôs designed for scalability, security, and ultra-fast transactions. Built by ex-Meta (formerly Facebook) engineers, Aptos is powered by the Move programming language, which makes it faster and safer than many existing blockchains. Aptos solves major blockchain problems like slow transaction speeds and expensive gas fees. title: Filecoin price prediction 2025-2031: What‚Äôs the future for FIL?
body: Key takeaways : Our Filecoin price predictions suggest an average market price of $4.13 in 2025. By 2028, the price is projected to reach $14.65. By 2031, FIL may reach $49.84. Filecoin is a decentralized storage network designed to securely and efficiently store humanity‚Äôs most important information. Launched by Protocol Labs in October 2020, it utilizes blockchain technology to create a peer-to-peer digital storage marketplace. Users can rent unused hard drive space to earn Filecoin tokens (FIL), the network‚Äôs native cryptocurrency. The system operates on a proof-of-replication and proof-of-spacetime consensus mechanism, ensuring that data is reliably stored over time and that storage providers hold the exact copies they claim. This approach incentivizes a robust and distributed network of storage providers, enhancing data retrieval speeds and security compared to traditional centralized servers. Filecoin aims to reduce the costs of storage services by leveraging the global surplus of storage capacity. As part of the broader Web3 ecosystem, it supports decentralized applications (dApps) and services requiring secure, decentralized data storage solutions, significantly advancing decentralized internet infrastructure. Is Filecoin a good investment? Filecoin is a decentralized storage network aiming to revolutionize data storage. Its investment potential depends on market adoption and competition. Like all cryptocurrencies, it carries significant risks due to volatility. Investors should carefully research and assess their risk tolerance before considering investing. Does Filecoin have a future? Filecoin‚Äôs future appears promising due to its unique position in decentralized data storage, addressing the growing demand for secure alternatives to traditional cloud services. Analysts predict potential price increases, with estimates suggesting it could reach $59 by 2030, contingent on market conditions and adoption rates Can Filecoin reach $50? Based on our current price predictions, Filecoin is likely to reach $50 by 2030. The projected Filecoin price stands at a maximum price of 58.8 by 2030. Is it worth investing in Filecoin? Investing in Filecoin may be worthwhile due to its innovative approach to decentralized data storage, which meets growing demand in the tech sector. However, potential investors should consider market volatility and conduct thorough research, as price predictions vary widely, reflecting both optimism and caution among analysts Is Filecoin safe? Filecoin employs cryptographic security for its decentralized storage network and robust security protocols, including cryptographic proof for data integrity, but it is not without risks. Potential issues include market volatility, regulatory uncertainty, and technical vulnerabilities. Users should thoroughly research and exercise caution when using or investing in Filecoin. Is Filecoin built on Ethereum? Filecoin is not built on Ethereum; it operates on its blockchain. However, it has integrated with Ethereum to enhance functionality, enabling smart contracts and facilitating interactions between the two ecosystems. This collaboration allows developers to leverage both platforms for decentralized storage and applications Recent news / Opinions on Filecoin In 2024, NuklaiData‚Äôs blockchain, which powers mass data adoption, and the Filecoin Foundation joined forces to archive global data and enhance AI technologies with contextualized data ontologies. title: Japan‚Äôs SBI Posts Record Crypto Profits; Aims for Nation‚Äôs First USDC Listing
body: The Japanese securities giant SBI has posted record crypto-related profits as it aims to win the race to become the first crypto exchange operator in the country to list USD Coin (USDC) . Per an official SBI Group announcement and a report from the Japanese-language media outlet CoinPost , the firm has also announced plans to expand its range of crypto offerings. Crypto Bull Market Driving SBI Growth? In its consolidated financial results for the third quarter of the current financial year, SBI announced revenues of approximately 62.8 billion yen on its crypto business units, a year-on-year increase of 103.5%. The market cap of USD Coin over the past 12 months. (Source: CoinMarketCap) The firm also posted pre-tax profits of around 18.1 billion yen ($119.6 million), a 787% year-on-year rise from Q3 of FY2023. The firm operates the SBI VC Trade and BITPoint crypto exchanges, as well as the crypto mining firm SBI Crypto. It also operates the UK liquidity provider and market maker B2C2 and the Tokyo-based blockchain firm HashHub. Japan must act immediately to improve its fiscal health as the risks of natural disasters mount and social security costs continue to increase, says the IMF https://t.co/CQZQcWLN18 ‚Äî Bloomberg Economics (@economics) February 9, 2025 The firm said the ‚Äúrevitalized‚Äù crypto markets had helped buoy growth on its crypto exchange platforms. And SBI said that it had seen a quarter-to-quarter rise of 15.3% in the number of accounts on SBI VC Trade and BITpoint. It also forecasted that the combined revenue of SBI VC Trade and BITPoint Japan would exceed 600 billion yen ($3.96 million) in the current quarter. DMM Bitcoin Customers Set for March Migration The company is also set to take over another former domestic rival, DMM Bitcoin, with the latter‚Äôs customers slated to migrate to SBI VC Trade by March 8 . The firm said that this would help it boost the number of crypto wallets on its SBI VC Trade platform to ‚Äúabout 1.3 million.‚Äù BITPoint also hosts some 400,000 wallets. Japanese crypto exchanges have faced a long wait for regulators to let them start listing USD-pegged stablecoins. Following a November 2023 agreement with Circle, SBI has been pushing for permission to start offering USDC pairings in Japan. Source: @21co/Dune The SBI Holdings Chairman and CEO Yoshitaka Kitao said companies were now laying the ground for ‚Äúthe full-scale introduction of stablecoins in Japan.‚Äù Recent revisions to the Payment Services Act are set to provide Japanese crypto exchanges with the chance to enter the stablecoins market, Kitao noted. title: Bitcoin (BTC) Price Analysis: Analyst Sounds Miner Sell-off Warning as BTC Holds $96K
body: Bitcoin price has stagnated over the last 4-days, consolidating just above the $96,500 on Feb 9. A prominent market analysts, Charles Edwards has hinted at a potential miner sell-off, a move that could tilt BTC price action bearish in the week ahead. Bitcoin (BTC) Enters 4-Day Stagnation as Bears Mount Resistance at $97K Bitcoin (BTC) made a sluggish start to February 2025, as bearish macroeconomic headwinds, as turbulence from Trump-led U.S.-China trade war tariffs, weighed heavily on market sentiment. Following an initial knee-jerk reaction that triggered over $2 billion in crypto liquidations, BTC markets found temporary relief on Thursday, February 6, stabilizing around the $96,000 support level. However, while major altcoins like Binance Coin ( BNB ) and Solana ( SOL ) have recorded considerable gains in recent days, Bitcoin has remained stagnant since February 6. Bitcoin Price Action (BTCUSDT), Feb 10, 2025 | Source: TradingView The shaded portion in the chart above illustrates BTC price consolidating within a tight $100,000 ‚Äì $95,000 range over the past four trading sessions, signaling indecision among market participants. Despite resilient buyer support near $96,000, a breakout above the $97,000 resistance has remained elusive, raising concerns of a potential reversal if bearish pressures intensify. Capriole Investments Founder Hints at Miner Sell-Off Amid Subdued BTC Price Action When a systemically important asset like BTC lags behind the broader market uptrend, it often signals the presence of an active internal bearish catalyst. Supporting this theory, Charles Edwards, founder of Capriole Investments, flagged a significant miner sell-off event as a possible reason behind Bitcoin‚Äôs stagnation. ‚ÄúBitcoin miner capitulation! A new capitulation event has just started. We all know what it means when a Hash Ribbon buy signal eventually follows‚Ä¶ A lot can happen between now and then. But we are entering a window of opportunity,‚Äù Charles Edwards, founder of Capriole Investments The Hash Ribbons indicator, a well-regarded on-chain metric, identifies periods of miner capitulation based on hash rate dynamics. Historically, when Bitcoin‚Äôs hash rate declines sharply, it suggests that miners are struggling with profitability, often leading to sell-offs as they offload BTC to cover operational costs. While miner capitulation typically precedes long-term recovery, it can induce short-term bearish price action. Miners‚Äô Reserves Drop Signals Additional Selling Pressure Further supporting this bearish Bitcoin price forecast , IntoTheBlock‚Äôs Miner Reserves metric highlights a sharp drop in BTC holdings among mining entities. This indicator tracks the daily changes in the aggregate Bitcoin balances held in wallets controlled by recognized miners and mining pools, offering insights into miner activity. Between February 4 and February 8, miner reserves fell from 1.94 million BTC to 1.91 million BTC, marking an outflow of approximately 30,000 BTC‚Äîequivalent to nearly $3 billion at current market prices. This level of selling pressure is significant, as it inflates short-term market supply, potentially weighing down Bitcoin‚Äôs price. Bitcoin Miners Reserves | BTCUSDT Historically, periods of large miner sell-offs have coincided with either price stagnation or temporary declines, as excess BTC supply outpaces existing demand. If miners continue offloading reserves at this scale, Bitcoin could struggle to maintain the $96,000 support level, increasing the risk of a deeper pullback toward $94,500 or lower in the coming sessions. While long-term holders may view miner capitulation as a buy-the-dip opportunity, the immediate outlook for Bitcoin remains uncertain. If selling pressure from miners subsides and Bitcoin manages a sustained breakout above $97,000, a renewed bullish trend could emerge. However, failure to do so could see Bitcoin extend its current stagnation or even slip into a short-term downtrend. With Bitcoin at a critical juncture, traders and investors will be closely monitoring miner activity and macroeconomic developments for further directional cues. The post Bitcoin (BTC) Price Analysis: Analyst Sounds Miner Sell-off Warning as BTC Holds $96K appeared first on CoinGape .

title: University of Austin Will Set Up Bitcoin Fund As Part of $200mn Endowment
body: The University of Austin is set to establish a pioneering Bitcoin investment fund, reflecting the increasing integration of cryptocurrency within U.S. academic institutions. The university plans to allocate over $5 million to this fund, which will be part of its $200 million endowment. Chun Lai, the foundation‚Äôs chief investment officer, emphasized the institution‚Äôs proactive approach, stating, ‚ÄúWe don‚Äôt want to be left behind when their [cryptocurrency‚Äôs] potential materializes dramatically.‚Äù This initiative follows recent developments in higher education‚Äôs engagement with digital assets. Notably, Emory University recently disclosed a $15 million investment in Bitcoin through Grayscale‚Äôs spot Bitcoin exchange-traded fund (ETF), marking it as the first U.S. university endowment to report such holdings. The University of Austin intends to maintain its Bitcoin holdings for a minimum of five years. Chad Thevenot, senior vice president for advancement at the university, explained the strategy: ‚ÄúWe think there is long-term value there, just the same way that we might think there is long-term value in stocks or real estate.‚Äù Beyond academia, cryptocurrencies are gaining traction among retirement funds, indicating a broader shift in financial strategies. A recent Bitget Research report revealed that up to 20% of Gen Z and Alpha are open to receiving pensions in cryptocurrency. Furthermore, 78% of respondents expressed greater trust in ‚Äúalternative retirement savings options‚Äù over traditional pension funds, highlighting a significant move towards decentralized finance and blockchain-based solutions. Gracy Chen, CEO of Bitget, commented on this trend: ‚ÄúYounger generations are no longer content with one-size-fits-all pension systems. They‚Äôre looking for modern solutions that give them more control, flexibility, and transparency.‚Äù As of January 2025, 40% of individuals in these younger demographics had already invested in cryptocurrency, underscoring the growing acceptance and integration of digital assets in various sectors. The University of Austin‚Äôs initiative signifies a notable step in the evolving relationship between higher education and cryptocurrency investments, potentially setting a precedent for other institutions to follow.

body: A large entity is reportedly accumulating Uniswap‚Äôs native token UNI , according to blockchain tracking firm Lookonchain. title: How the UAE is Leading the Way On Embracing the Metaverse and AI
body: The United Arab Emirates (UAE) has emerged as a global hub for innovation, with its rapid adoption of cryptocurrency, the metaverse, and artificial intelligence (AI) reshaping its economy. In its pursuit of technological supremacy, the UAE is actively fostering an environment conducive to digital transformation, attracting investors, entrepreneurs, and visionaries from around the world. A Crypto-Friendly Economy The UAE has positioned itself as one of the most progressive nations in terms of cryptocurrency adoption and regulation. Dubai and Abu Dhabi have introduced comprehensive legal frameworks to regulate and encourage the crypto industry. The Dubai Virtual Asset Regulatory Authority (VARA), established in 2022, provides clear guidelines for crypto exchanges, digital asset firms, and blockchain enterprises. This regulatory clarity has made the UAE an attractive destination for crypto startups and institutional investors alike. In addition, Abu Dhabi Global Market (ADGM) has developed a robust regulatory framework for digital assets, enabling businesses to operate with legal certainty. Binance, the world‚Äôs largest cryptocurrency exchange, has secured operational approval in Dubai, while Kraken and other major players have established a presence in Abu Dhabi. By embracing digital currencies, the UAE is cementing itself as a financial innovation hub, encouraging both institutional and retail adoption. Beyond regulation, the UAE government has actively explored the integration of blockchain technology within public services. The Dubai Blockchain Strategy aims to transition government transactions onto blockchain platforms, enhancing transparency, security, and efficiency. Furthermore, the UAE Central Bank is developing a central bank digital currency (CBDC) to modernize the financial system and improve cross-border transactions. The Metaverse Revolution The UAE is not only embracing crypto but also investing heavily in the metaverse, with Dubai leading the charge. In 2022, Dubai launched its ambitious Metaverse Strategy, which aims to generate 40,000 virtual jobs and contribute $4 billion to the emirate‚Äôs economy by 2030. The initiative seeks to make Dubai one of the top 10 metaverse economies globally, fostering innovation in virtual reality (VR), augmented reality (AR), and Web3 technologies. Government-backed entities, including the Dubai Future Foundation and the Abu Dhabi Investment Office, are investing in metaverse startups and infrastructure. The Dubai Municipality has even announced plans to create a virtual city where residents can interact in a fully immersive digital environment. Businesses are also leveraging the metaverse, with real estate developers showcasing virtual properties and luxury brands launching digital stores tailored for metaverse consumers. Tourism and retail, two of the UAE‚Äôs strongest economic pillars, are also set to benefit from metaverse integration. Airlines such as Emirates have announced metaverse-driven experiences to enhance customer engagement, while retail giants are adopting virtual shopping platforms to cater to tech-savvy consumers. These initiatives highlight the UAE‚Äôs vision to be at the forefront of digital innovation. Artificial Intelligence As a Priority AI is at the heart of the UAE‚Äôs digital transformation strategy. The country‚Äôs leadership has made AI development a national priority, exemplified by the appointment of the world‚Äôs first Minister of State for Artificial Intelligence in 2017. The UAE AI Strategy 2031 aims to position the nation as a global leader in AI, with plans to integrate AI across various sectors, including healthcare, finance, transportation, and public services. Dubai‚Äôs Smart City initiative and Abu Dhabi‚Äôs AI research efforts are driving AI adoption in governance and business operations. The country is also home to some of the world‚Äôs most advanced AI-driven projects, such as the Mohamed bin Zayed University of Artificial Intelligence (MBZUAI), the first university dedicated solely to AI research. AI is transforming industries across the UAE, from autonomous transportation solutions to AI-powered healthcare diagnostics. The UAE‚Äôs embrace of AI is evident in initiatives such as the Dubai Police‚Äôs use of AI-powered surveillance and the implementation of smart traffic systems to reduce congestion. In finance, AI-driven algorithms are optimizing investment strategies, fraud detection, and customer service automation. A Magnet for Global Talent and Investment The UAE‚Äôs proactive approach to crypto, the metaverse, and AI has positioned it as a prime destination for global talent and investment. The government has introduced business-friendly policies, including 100% foreign ownership in various tech-related sectors and long-term residency visas for entrepreneurs, tech professionals, and investors. International firms are flocking to the UAE to capitalize on its supportive regulatory environment, strategic location, and tax-friendly policies. Events like the Dubai Future Blockchain Summit and AI Everything attract industry leaders and innovators, reinforcing the UAE‚Äôs reputation as a technology-driven economy.

title: ETH Price Analysis: Ethereum Foundation Spotted Moving 50,000 ETH, Is It Bullish or Bearish?
body: ETH price opened trading around the $2,630 level on Feb 10, entering a 3-day stagnation phase. Historical data suggests Ethereum Foundation‚Äôs latest 50,000 ETH transaction could potentially spark volatile market reactions in the week ahead. Ethereum Price Settles at $2,600 as Bearish Pressure Subsides Ethereum (ETH) has struggled to gain momentum in the first week of February, facing multiple bearish catalysts. Internal challenges, including controversial network updates and an increasing circulating supply, have hindered bullish advances. Additionally, macroeconomic headwinds from the U.S.-China trade war have exacerbated the downturn. Ethereum Price Action (ETHUSD) | Source: TradingView Between February 1 and February 7, ETH price experienced a sharp 20% decline, dropping from $3,300 to the $2,600 level. Since February 7, the downward momentum has halted as selling pressure has eased considerably. However, despite this stabilization, ETH has yet to stage a meaningful recovery from last week‚Äôs losses. While other top altcoins like Binance Coin ( BNB ) and Solana ( SOL ) have posted gains over the weekend, ETH has remained stagnant within a tight $2,500 to $2,700 range. This consolidation closely mirrors Bitcoin‚Äôs price hiatus, highlighting investor indecision and a wait-and-see approach among traders. Ethereum Foundation Spotted Moving 50,000 ETH, Sparking Speculation Ethereum‚Äôs stagnation over the weekend coincided with shifting investor focus towards the broader altcoin market. While Bitcoin‚Äôs price inactivity has been attributed to a miner sell-off , as highlighted by Capriole Investments founder Charles Edwards, ETH‚Äôs sideways movement appears to be influenced by recent Ethereum Foundation transactions. On February 9, blockchain security and analytics platform PeckShield flagged a significant transaction involving the Ethereum Foundation‚Äîthe organization responsible for overseeing the network‚Äôs operations and development. ‚Äú#PeckShieldAlert The Ethereum Foundation has transferred 50,000 $ETH (worth ~$131.6M) to EF: DeFi Multisig for supporting and participating in the Ethereum DeFi ecosystem.‚Äù ‚Äì PeckshieldAlert, Feb 9, 2025. Notably, PeckShield clarified that the 50,000 ETH (~$131.6 million) was not liquidated but rather transferred to a new multi-signature wallet intended to support Ethereum‚Äôs DeFi ecosystem. In theory, this could be a bullish sign, signaling further investment in DeFi projects and ecosystem development. Ethereum Foundation Spotted Moving 50,000 ETH ($131.6 million) | Feb 9, 2025. However, historical trends suggest that ETH prices have often dipped following large Ethereum Foundation outflows. Insider sell-offs or major fund reallocations tend to trigger bearish sentiment among holders, as they raise concerns over potential future liquidations. These moves can also deter new market entrants who may fear increased volatility or further downside pressure. While this latest transaction was not a direct sell-off, traders are likely to remain cautious until further clarification emerges. Without a major positive uptick in broader market sentiment, ETH price could struggle for momentum at the start of the week. Looking ahead, investors will closely monitor Ethereum Foundation‚Äôs wallet activities and market reactions to gauge whether this latest development will ultimately serve as a bullish catalyst or signal renewed selling pressure. Until then, ETH‚Äôs short-term trajectory remains uncertain, with technical indicators pointing to both potential upside and risks of further stagnation. Ethereum Price Forecast: $2,750 Breakout Could Spin Market Sentiment Ethereum price prediction chart below presents a bearish-leaning outlook, as the asset continues to trade within a consolidation phase near $2,575. The falling wedge pattern, which previously provided a relief rally, has been invalidated by the latest breakdown, reinforcing near-term downside risks. Volume analysis reveals a notable decline in participation, suggesting a lack of bullish conviction at current levels. RSI stands at 29.61, deep in oversold territory, implying a potential technical rebound, but with the indicator still sloping downward, momentum remains weak. Ethereum Price Forecast | ETHUSDT For the bullish scenario, ETH would need to reclaim $2,750 as a support level to regain market confidence. A break above this level could trigger fresh buying pressure, opening the door for a recovery toward $3,000, where the prior resistance cluster resides. If buyers return, a shift in sentiment could propel ETH higher, mirroring gains seen in altcoins like Solana and Binance Coin. Conversely, failure to hold the $2,500 support could exacerbate selling pressure, potentially driving ETH toward $2,400 or lower. With historical data showing price declines following Ethereum Foundation transactions, traders remain cautious, and unless demand picks up, Ethereum could struggle to regain upward momentum in the near term. The post ETH Price Analysis: Ethereum Foundation Spotted Moving 50,000 ETH, Is It Bullish or Bearish? appeared first on CoinGape .

title: US Treasury Secretary Scott Bessent‚Äôs plans depend on D.O.G.E‚Äôs success
body: Scott Bessent, the new US Treasury Secretary under Trump‚Äôs administration, has a monster-sized mission. He‚Äôs been handed an economic puzzle that could break all financial markets and the entire global economy if he screws up. Scott‚Äôs job is to keep bond yields down, cut down on federal spending without triggering a recession, and somehow deal with the chaos of oil prices, a volatile dollar, and inflation. So Scott‚Äôs whole strategy leans heavily on Elon Musk‚Äôs Department of Government Efficiency, also known as D.O.G.E. Without Elon and his efficiency freaks (as he calls them), Scott‚Äôs vision could crumble. According to a Bloomberg report , Scott‚Äôs first quarterly funding announcement stayed in line with Janet Yellen‚Äôs strategy, focusing on issuing short-term bonds. Analysts expected him to move toward long-term bonds, but he didn‚Äôt. Short-term borrowing is Scott‚Äôs way of buying time, but the bond market won‚Äôt wait forever. Oil prices are a problem Scott can‚Äôt ignore President Donald Trump‚Äôs ‚Äúdrill, baby, drill‚Äù campaign slogan promised to bring inflation down by boosting oil supply, but oil doesn‚Äôt behave the way most people think. Cheaper oil doesn‚Äôt directly lower real borrowing costs. Traders in inflation-protected securities (TIPS) use energy futures to hedge their bets, which skews how inflation expectations play out in bond markets. Scott knows that even if oil prices drop, it won‚Äôt be enough to fix his problems. According to data from Absolute Strategy Research, energy now makes up a much smaller share of overall production costs. Even if oil prices doubled tomorrow, it wouldn‚Äôt cause the same economic disaster seen during the energy crises of the 1970s. But pushing oil prices down won‚Äôt be easy. Trump‚Äôs plan to refill the Strategic Petroleum Reserve will boost demand, driving prices up instead of down. And OPEC won‚Äôt sit by and let the US flood the market. Scott puts his faith in Elon Musk‚Äôs D.O.G.E team Cutting federal spending is where things get messy. According to data from BCA Research, federal spending needs to be reduced by 3.6% to stabilize the debt-to-GDP ratio. That‚Äôs a huge cut, and Congress won‚Äôt approve it without a fight. Elon‚Äôs D.O.G.E team is targeting waste across multiple departments and making aggressive cuts, but if they fail, Scott would be staring down a financial and economical meltdown. And if Elon cuts too much, he risks triggering a recession. If he cuts too little, we‚Äôre gonna face a bond market riot. Anyway, Scott is also steering Trump away from interfering with the Federal Reserve. Trump has said time and time again that he should have more control over interest rate decisions, but at his Senate confirmation hearing, Scott said he knows that would send markets into a panic. Instead, he‚Äôs pushing for a more strategic approach‚Äîreplacing current Fed Chair Jerome Powell with someone the market respects. Former Fed governor Kevin Warsh is the top pick, because according to Scott, he‚Äôs experienced, market-friendly, and ‚Äúunlikely to rock the boat.‚Äù Meanwhile, just earlier, president Trump ordered the US Treasury to stop producing pennies, via a post on Truth Social that reads: ‚ÄúFor far too long the United States has minted pennies which literally cost us more than 2 cents. This is so wasteful! I have instructed my Secretary of the US Treasury to stop producing new pennies. Let‚Äôs rip the waste out of our great nations budget, even if it‚Äôs a penny at a time.‚Äù This of course comes amid D.O.G.E‚Äôs tensions with the Treasury after he audited and was given access to its data. But unfortunately, a federal judge ruled on Saturday to ban Elon and his team from accessing the Treasury‚Äôs data ‚Äòtemporarily.‚Äô Scott also faces a dollar problem. Historically, oil prices and the dollar move in opposite directions. When oil prices crash, the dollar tends to rise. It happened in 2014 when OPEC flooded the market, and it happened again in the 1980s after the Iran crisis. But a strong dollar makes imports cheaper, which helps fight inflation, but it also makes US exports less competitive. Trump‚Äôs economic vision relies on boosting exports, so you can see why Scott can‚Äôt afford a dollar that‚Äôs too strong. body: The Dogecoin price has continued to decline as the hype surrounding the meme coin dwindles, leaving many investors questioning its future. title: Brazil‚Äôs B3 Strengthens Crypto Market with New Bitcoin and Altcoin Futures
body: The post Brazil‚Äôs B3 Strengthens Crypto Market with New Bitcoin and Altcoin Futures appeared first on Coinpedia Fintech News Brazil‚Äôs largest stock exchange, B3, is making strides to further integrate cryptocurrencies into its offerings by introducing Bitcoin options and futures contracts for Ethereum (ETH) and Solana (SOL), as reported by CoinDesk. This strategic move, which is expected to roll out later this year, will diversify the exchange‚Äôs crypto product range and strengthen the country‚Äôs digital asset market. The launch follows the success of Bitcoin futures, which were introduced in April 2024. These futures have generated significant trading volume, averaging 5 billion Brazilian Real (approximately $860 million) each month, a testament to the growing interest in crypto trading among Brazilian investors. Gilson Finkelsztain, CEO of B3, confirmed the expansion in an interview and opened up about the exchange‚Äôs commitment to staying at the forefront of the cryptocurrency space. The new Bitcoin options, along with ETH and SOL futures, are expected to attract institutional and retail traders alike, offering more flexibility and hedging opportunities within the rapidly evolving digital asset market. As the adoption of cryptocurrencies continues to grow, this move positions B3 as a key player in Brazil‚Äôs crypto ecosystem. In comparison, Brazil‚Äôs traditional cryptocurrency exchanges saw a total trading volume of $1.13 billion in January 2025, illustrating the increasing demand for crypto products in the country. This expansion is a significant step forward for Brazil‚Äôs financial sector, signaling the nation‚Äôs growing acceptance and integration of digital assets into mainstream finance.

title: Binance Founder CZ Says ‚ÄòI am Not Against Meme Coins,‚Äô But Declares He‚Äôs Not Investing in Them
body: The post Binance Founder CZ Says ‚ÄòI am Not Against Meme Coins,‚Äô But Declares He‚Äôs Not Investing in Them appeared first on Coinpedia Fintech News Even with the crypto market going through a lot of ups and downs, new meme coins are starting to gain more attention and even see some big price boosts. One meme coin making headlines is Test (TST), a new coin on the Binance Smart Chain. There have been rumors that it‚Äôs linked to Changpeng Zhao (CZ), the founder of Binance. But CZ has stepped in to clear things up and address the growing buzz around TST. CZ Sets the Record Straight About TST CZ recently posted online to explain that TST was never officially endorsed by him or Binance. ‚ÄúIt was just a test token used in a video tutorial,‚Äù he said. Despite his clarification, TST‚Äôs popularity only grew. ‚ÄúEvery clarification post just made it more viral for whatever reason,‚Äù CZ jokes. As for the listing of TST on Binance, CZ explained that he wasn‚Äôt involved in the decision. ‚ÄúExchanges want to list popular coins with high trading volume,‚Äù he said. ‚ÄúIf your coin is in demand, you don‚Äôt need to talk to exchanges. Just focus on your project.‚Äù Is CZ Moving Away From Fundamentals? With the rise of meme coins, many wondered if CZ was shifting his focus away from the core principles of crypto. However, CZ made it clear that this was not the case. ‚ÄúI‚Äôm a builder,‚Äù he said. ‚ÄúI always focus on fundamentals.‚Äù Does he have any interest in meme coins? CZ said he hasn‚Äôt bought any. ‚ÄúI haven‚Äôt bought a single meme coin yet,‚Äù he confirmed. He also said that just because he‚Äôs not into meme coins, it doesn‚Äôt mean he‚Äôs against them. ‚ÄúI‚Äôve worked hard to support many altcoins and the crypto industry as a whole, and I have the same view on meme coins.‚Äù Why Are Meme Coins So Popular? So why are meme coins like TST becoming so popular, especially compared to utility tokens? CZ had a few thoughts on this. He pointed out that in recent years, regulators have cracked down on utility tokens, calling them securities, which led some people to turn to meme coins as a safer option. He also explained that meme coins are harder to value, which makes them attractive to speculators. ‚ÄúThings with clear value are harder to speculate on,‚Äù he said. ‚ÄúMemes are fun, and there‚Äôs a whole community around them.‚Äù

Binance Coin historic price sentiment Binance Coin (BNB) was launched in July 2017 through an Initial Coin Offering (ICO), with an initial price of around $0.10, according to historical crypto market data. As a utility token for the Binance cryptocurrency exchange, it offered users reduced trading fees. In late 2017, BNB‚Äôs price significantly increased and reached its first major peak in January 2018, hitting approximately $24. However, it experienced a decline following the broader market correction. BNB price history | Coinmarketcap Throughout 2018 and 2019, BNB‚Äôs price experienced gradual growth as the BNB market soared. In 2018, BNB traded near $13 for most of the year but stepped down to $5 by December. However, BNB reached above $30 in June 2019. Despite the global economic uncertainty caused by the COVID-19 pandemic, BNB maintained relative stability and saw an upward trend in 2020. Due to the growing popularity of Binance as an exchange and the expansion of its ecosystem, the coin touched the $34 range in November 2020. BNB experienced a significant bull run in early 2021, reaching a high above $600 in May 2021. Positive market sentiment helped improve its market cap, which remained at an all-time high until recently. Binance Coin‚Äôs price dynamics in 2022 were characterized by volatility and were influenced by a combination of macroeconomic factors and regulatory developments around the Binance exchange, which led to a bearish scenario. This took BNB to less than $220 in June and an average price of $250 in December. BNB remained a significant player in the cryptocurrency market in 2023, recovering to about $350 in April. However, it soon lost momentum, reaching about $205 in October. In late December, BNB climbed back to about $325. In February 2025, BNB is trading near the psychological mark of $670, just below the January prices.

title: Central African Republic‚Äôs meme coin sparks suspicion amid deepfake and scam allegations
body: The CAR token skyrocketed, but deepfake warnings and a sudden website takedown have raised questions about whether this is truly a government-backed initiative. On Feb. 10, the Central African Republic made an unexpected move by announcing the launch of its own memecoin, CAR. The announcement came directly from the official X account of President Faustin-Archange Touad√©ra, who described the project as an experiment aimed at uniting people, supporting national development, and putting CAR in the global spotlight. Today, we are launching $CAR ‚Äì an experiment designed to show how something as simple as a meme can unite people, support national development, and put the Central African Republic on the world stage in a unique way. Contract: 7oBYdEhV4GkXC19ZfgAvXpJWp2Rn9pm1Bx2cVNxFpump ‚Äî Faustin-Archange Touad√©ra (@FA_Touadera) February 9, 2025 ‚ÄúToday, we are launching $CAR‚Äîan experiment designed to show how something as simple as a meme can unite people, support national development, and put the Central African Republic on the world stage in a unique way,‚Äù Touad√©ra‚Äôs official X account posted on Feb. 10. He linked the initiative to the country‚Äôs previous pro-crypto stance, noting that he was the second world leader to adopt Bitcoin ( BTC ) as legal tender. As the second president in the world to adopt Bitcoin as legal tender, I have always recognized the potential of crypto and its benefits on a global scale. For all information about CAR Meme, visit https://t.co/kwd5NGxoZG ‚Äî Faustin-Archange Touad√©ra (@FA_Touadera) February 9, 2025 The memecoin was launched on the Solana ( SOL ) based Pump.fun platform and initially saw an overwhelming market response. Within hours, its valuation surged as traders rushed to participate in what was seen as the first-ever national memecoin. However, while the idea of a government-backed meme coin generated huge interest, skepticism quickly followed. Within hours, deepfake allegations, website suspensions, and questionable domain registrations began casting doubt on the project. You might also like: Public Citizen and lawmakers are closing in on Trump‚Äôs meme coin windfall ‚Äî Is the party over? The announcement and immediate red flags Skepticism over the memecoin emerged after AI detection tools analyzed the president‚Äôs announcement video. One deepfake detection model, Seferbekov, found an 82% probability that the video was AI-generated, while another, Ensemble, also flagged it as suspicious. However, two other AI tools, Avatrify and Deepware‚Äôs checker, did not detect signs of manipulation. The controversy deepened when the memecoin‚Äôs official X account, created to provide updates on the project, was suspended without explanation. Hours later, the president‚Äôs X account acknowledged the suspension and stated that they were working with X to restore it. We are working with @X to get @CARMeme_News back as soon as possible. Meanwhile, the token supply has been securely locked through @streamflow_fi , according to the distribution plan, emission groups, and release schedule detailed on our website. ‚Äî Faustin-Archange Touad√©ra (@FA_Touadera) February 9, 2025 As scrutiny intensified, Yokai Ryujin, founder of UnrevealedXYZ, pointed out irregularities in how the CAR memecoin‚Äôs domain was registered. He noted that the car.meme domain was registered on ‚ÄúNamecheap‚Äù, a budget-friendly domain provider, only three days before the announcement‚Äîa move he described as highly uncharacteristic for a government-backed initiative. ‚ÄºÔ∏è CT and my crew be cautious about $CAR domain registered on namecheap 3 days ago‚Ä¶ does not look like what president or a country would do‚Ä¶ do not let liquidity be sucked out from the ecosystem‚Ä¶ NFA ‚Äì I could be very well wrong‚Ä¶ but üö© pic.twitter.com/KnDaIywTXl ‚Äî Yokai Ryujin (@YokaiCapital) February 9, 2025 Shortly after, Namecheap suspended the website, confirming that it had been flagged as an ‚Äúabusive service.‚Äù We have suspended the abusive service. Thank you. ‚Äî Namecheap.com (@Namecheap) February 10, 2025 Ryujin, who had warned about the project early on, posted on X that the takedown validated concerns. ‚ÄúI tried to warn you about this from the start, and I‚Äôll keep fighting for you,‚Äù he wrote, urging the crypto community to remain cautious. I tried to warn you about this from the start to the top and I'll keep fighting for you. @Namecheap now confirmed it was a scam, and the website is returned to the rightful owners. Clear your cache or use a new browser. Hold big profiles accountable and save the space. $CAR üßµ https://t.co/iToMPYNGzA pic.twitter.com/At1pcUHajb ‚Äî Yokai Ryujin (@YokaiCapital) February 10, 2025 Market activity and a volatile debut Despite the controversy, the CAR token surged upon launch, reaching a peak valuation of $527 million. However, as of this writing on Feb. 10, the token‚Äôs value has dropped to $460 million. The timing of this controversy is crucial, as the crypto world has recently seen a spike in fraudulent meme coin launches. Just a few days ago, scammers hijacked the X accounts of former Malaysian Prime Minister Mahathir Mohamad and Solana DEX aggregator Jupiter to promote fraudulent memecoins. The similarities in tactics‚Äîunexpected high-profile endorsements, rapid website takedowns, and sudden social media suspensions‚Äîhave led many to believe that CAR might be another high-profile deception. However, at this stage, there is no clear confirmation on whether CAR is an official government-backed initiative or an elaborate scam. Crypto.news is actively investigating this developing story and will provide updates as more information emerges. Read more: El Salvador ends Bitcoin as legal tender ‚Äî Here‚Äôs why it didn‚Äôt work
